extendedInfo.description: Be ready for thousands of aliens coming, stay cool and shoot them up!The aliens have invaded the Earth again while you â the most skilled pilot of the universal â were out â¦ on vacation in a far away galaxy. The invasion never ends until they destroy all humanity, and this time you are the last hope of the Universal. Fly back right now to save your homeland!COSMOS â a two-dimensional SHUMP â is very addicted game with unique graphic & great gameplay, which we truly believe that you will enjoy every single moment of playing it.Features:- 9 planets throughout the solar system with 81 exciting waves- 6 brutal bosses waiting for you- 6 unique weapons to aid your adventure- 4 power-ups to change turn the tide of the battle- 20 different elite enemy formations- 3 difficulties to overcome, you shall not pass

reviews.title: Its great game, great design, great gameplay,music
reviews.comment: Reminds me the good old times and best of all it runs on my 46\" TV easily controlled by wireless mouse
reviews.author: John Smith

reviews.title: Great game, until...
reviews.comment: Really fun and addicting game with great graphics and mechanics, until they tell you that you nees the full version to keep playing. Would be 5 stars if the game was actualy free.
reviews.author: Gaba Joe

reviews.comment: This is a good game simple and awesome , but can you at least add a boss health ? Is hard to know if the boss gonna die

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Simple and fun. Just as a mobile game should be
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Poor Man\'s \"Radiant\"
reviews.comment: If you have somehow stumbled across this app and think it looks like fun, do yourself a favor and search for \"Radiant\" by Hexage ... and play that instead. This game is like Radiant but without the crisp graphics, awesome soundtrack, humorous storyline, and addictive gameplay. This isn\'t a bad app, especially for free, but it just isn\'t as good as Radiant. (Galaxy Nexus)
reviews.author: James E. Nichols

reviews.title: Shameless
reviews.comment: Radiant rip off minus the great gameplay.
reviews.author: A Google User
